sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

About Amruta

Our clients, engagements and projects span into multiple industries -

  • Financial Services
  • Health Care
  • E-Commerce and Hi-Tech
  • Supply chain, Travel and Transportation

We bring relevant experience in traditional and non-traditional data analytics to solve enterprise level problems across risk, marketing, finance, operations, supply chain, customer, digital, mobile, and social functional areas.

We work with you to grow the pilot use case to a sustainable solution and we applied domain knowledge and design thinking to ensure that your functional requirements are comprehensively understood, and we follow agile processes to implement the platform and its customizations for your requirements. We implement a user interface that improves the business outcomes and enables AI/ML algorithms to self learn from the user or expert feedback.

) } export default About
